name: black ash || white sand
description:
Same exact game as black ash | white sand, just without copywrited music. 

For Indiepocalypse Issue #7, a version of my game black ash | white sand but with music that's my own. I didn't edit the original game because voting is still open for Obscure Game Jam #1, the jam for which this game was originally made, but I really wanted to be able to submit to Indiepocalypse too! So here it is.

{ }

 Click to toggle things in the room and uncover the story of the ghost. The more text you can see once the lights go out, the closer you are to an ending!

TW: subtle sexual trauma/violence implications, strong language (cursing), possible seizure trigger (text might flash) 

{ }

"In a certain sense, he had always been writing from the grave. As his body turns to ash — black ash, his words turn to sand — white sand." — Mark C. Taylor Williamstown (On Edmond Jabes, via The Book of Margins)
